description: When Bruno came in to be tickled he said (as men often do), “I’m really not ticklish!” I always smile when I hear that because often times these guys are the most fun. A handsome, built man who doesn’t think he’s ticklish often turns out to be VERY ticklish. They’ve just not been tickled the right way before. Bruno turns out to be very ticklish on his upper body, armpits and his gorgeous soles - and it was so hot to watch him discover this fact!
title: Bruno Finds Out He's Ticklish
